visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include two series: 'Tokyo' with data [7.0, 6.9, 9.5, 14.5, 18.2, 21.5, 25.2, 26.5, 23.3, 18.3, 13.9, 9.6] and 'London' with data [3.9, 4.2, 5.7, 8.5, 11.9, 15.2, 17.0, 16.6, 14.2, 10.3, 6.6, 4.8]. The chart should use custom colors for the series and include additional configurations such as chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart includes two data series: 'Tokyo' and 'London', each with monthly temperature data. The axes and labels are styled with specific colors and font sizes to enhance readability. Custom colors are applied to the series to differentiate them visually. Additional configurations include settings for the chart's background color, margins, and legend, ensuring a well-organized and visually appealing presentation of the data.
